title.narrative: Competitiveness of Business in Local Production Systems in São Paulo
Competitividad Sistemas Productivos Locales São Paulo

description.narrative: El objetivo general (fin) del Programa es fomentar la competitividad de la economía del Estado de San Pablo. El objetivo específico (propósito) es articular diversos instrumentos de apoyo empresarial para la promoción de prácticas competitivas y sustentables en las empresas de los APLs atendidos por el Programa.

The general objective of the Program is to contribute to economic growth (sales, employment) of productive sectors located specially in the state of São Paulo. The specific objective is to strengthen PyMEs cooperation and joined actions within APLs and stimulate them, through sample initiatives, towards innovation, technological development and international markets access.

activity-description.narrative: O propósito do Programa é incrementar a coordenação empresarial e institucional para permitir a adoção de práticas competitivas em empresas dos arranjos produtivos locais do Estado de São Paulo.
